parameters.text:
=Happy New Month!

New reorder levels have been set.

schema.id: Lead Time (from Supplier (from Product Name copy))
schema.displayName: Lead Time (from Supplier (from Product Name copy))

schema.id: Units Per Case (from Product Name copy) 2
schema.displayName: Units Per Case (from Product Name copy) 2

parameters.content:
# Procedure / Logic
## * Triggered at midnight of a new month.
## * Monthly Sales for Items live in ERP are moved i.e Month 2 to 1, 3 to 2, and 4 to 3.
## * A new report is created for the sales analytics for the just concluded month.
## * The report is accessed and all Month 4 of all items in the report are updated in Airtable.
## * After a few seconds to allow calculations in airtable to complete, the records whose ROL>0 are accessed and their reorder levels updated in the ERP.

## Area that needs the change:

### Write code to extract date and set it to current month

schema.id: CP Unit Price Excl VAT Incl Disc
schema.displayName: CP Unit Price Excl VAT Incl Disc
